result.title: My Enea
result.introduction:
My Enea - Your Energy Under Control

 

Quick and easy access to bills and account status in one intuitive place

 

A modern mobile application designed with customer comfort in mind
result.development:
Key Application Features:

  • Energy Consumption Data (interactive chart)
  • Home screen personalization
  • Wide Choice of Contact Forms
  • Energy Cost Control
  • Contract Information
  • Convenient Payments
  • Multilingual Support
  • Energy Purchase
  • Google Maps
  • Dark Mode
  • E-invoices
  • Animations
  • Chat
  • And more..
result.conclusion:
Experience:

  • First 6 months: Mobile application development under the supervision of an experienced Mobile Developer (co-creator of a mobile app for a major bank). This included: Active participation in defining the architecture and implementing key functionalities.
  • Next ${DATE_PERIOD:2024.02}: Independent Flutter Developer. Full responsibility for the mobile application's development.

Scope of Responsibilities:

  • Creating new views
  • Managing the local database
  • Maintaining and updating libraries
  • Adding new functionalities
  • Communication with the backend team
  • Publishing the app on Google Play and App Store
  • Ensuring application architecture quality and creating tests
  • Updates: Flutter, Xcode, CocoaPods, Gradle, etc.
  • Coordinating, implementing, and testing new functionalities
  • Handling: Firebase, Google Maps, Flavors, Analytics, Crashlytics, Deep Links, Push Notifications, On-device authentication, Permissions, saving and sending files, etc.

result.title: Nuclear Energy Lexicon
result.introduction:
Nuclear Energy Lexicon

An application with a Polish-English lexicon of nuclear energy terms

The Polish-English nuclear energy lexicon application was created to provide a database of terms for everyone interested in the industry and topics related to nuclear energy.

The lexicon is publicly available, free, and adapted for offline use.
result.development:
Key Application Features:

  • Onboarding
  • Promotional screen
  • Term search engine
  • English-Polish Translator
  • Polish-English Translator
  • Offline and online database
  • Digital accessibility for visually impaired users
result.conclusion:
Scope of Responsibilities:

  • Client communication
  • Backend integration
  • Collaboration with a Flutter Developer
  • Creating a local SQL database
  • Application development under the supervision of a Project Manager
  • Publishing the app on Google Play and App Store
  • Ensuring application architecture quality and creating tests

result.title: ID Logistics
result.shortDescription:
Application Features:

  • Reporting issues
  • Zebra scanner
  • Communication

Winner of the international 'The Factory 2023' competition
result.introduction:
ID Logistics - Warehouse Management

The Polish ID Logistics team wins the international 'The Factory 2023' competition

'The Factory 2023' for the most innovative project in warehouse operations management.

The winner was the Polish ID Logistics team, awarded for 'Live Warehouse'. According to several hundred managers, this project was deemed the best among solutions submitted by over 20 ID Logistics teams from around the world.
result.development:
Key Application Features:

  • Reporting issues via:
    • 'Zebra' laser scanner
    • Checklist
    • Photo
    • Voice recording
    • Note
  • Displaying an 'overlay' widget over other apps
  • Dynamic creation of issue categories
  • Ticket management
  • Reviewing issues
  • Multilingual support
  • Messenger
  • Login
result.conclusion:
Scope of Responsibilities:

  • Independent design, implementation, and publication of the mobile application using Flutter.
  • Coordinating, implementing, and testing new functionalities
  • Collaboration with the project manager and backend team
  • Creating native communication with the 'Zebra' scanner
  • Creating new user interfaces
  • Ensuring application architecture quality and creating tests
  • Client communication

result.title: Healthy You
result.introduction:
Healthy You - Your Health Under Control

Everything for your health: surveys, podcasts, audio plays, and articles in one intuitive place.

A modern mobile application designed to care for patients' daily health.
result.development:
Key Application Features:

  • Smart notifications about upcoming check-ups, so you never forget
  • Individual analysis and interpretation of test results, tailored to your profile
  • Access to a rich library of health articles, also available offline
  • Personalization of the app based on gender, age, and lifestyle
  • Daily surveys to monitor well-being and health
  • A wide selection of educational videos on health and prevention
  • Quick and secure registration
  • Clear and transparent terms of service
  • Advanced settings
  • Application login
result.conclusion:
Experience:

Development of a mobile application supporting patients, in collaboration with another Flutter Developer. I served as the Team Leader on this project.

Scope of Responsibilities:

  • Adding new functionalities
  • Communication with the backend team
  • Creating new user interfaces
  • Publishing the app on Google Play and App Store
  • Ensuring application architecture quality and creating tests
  • Distributing tasks within the development team
  • Coordinating, implementing, and testing new functionalities
  • Implementation: push notifications, on-device authentication, permissions

result.title: Pam 365
result.introduction:
PAM365 - Apartment Management

Comprehensive property management and profit maximization.
result.development:
Key Application Features:

The application consists of three interdependent apps and includes over 70 views. Each manager has their own database of apartments and clients.

  • Manager Module
    • Creating and managing apartments
    • Supervising the service team
    • Handling reservations
    • Client communication
  • Client Module
    • Contact with Manager and Service team
    • Check-in confirmation
    • Booking apartments
    • Browsing available offers
  • Service Module
    • Executing cleaning schedules
    • Managing service requests
  • Shared Part
    • Firebase Cloud Storage
    • Realtime Database
    • Push Notifications
    • Login
result.conclusion:
Scope of Responsibilities:

  • Fully independent project
  • Creating the backend in Firebase
  • Building a modular mobile application
  • Writing scripts for Firebase Functions
  • Communication with the backend team and PM
  • Implementing new views based on Figma designs
  • Ensuring application architecture quality and creating tests
  • Adding and testing new functionalities
  • Implementation: deep links, push notifications, saving and sending files, realtime database, cloud storage

result.title: Quiz&Money
result.introduction:
Quiz && Money

Play Quizzes, Win Prizes

Quiz'n'Money is an online quiz game where players compete in various knowledge categories.

Players can choose from different question categories and compete against other participants from around the world. Players can earn points and compete in rankings.
result.development:
Key Application Features:

  • Online game
  • Reward system
  • Player ranking
  • Multiplayer game
  • Timed gameplay
  • First come, first served
  • Login via Google Authenticate
result.conclusion:
Scope of Responsibilities:

  • Manual testing
  • App maintaining
  • Communication with the backend
  • Bug reporting
  • Working in a multi-person team
  • Executing predefined scenarios
  • Collaboration with a Native Android Developer

result.title: Smart Home
result.shortDescription:
Application Features:

  • Measuring Electricity Usage
  • Motion and smoke detection
  • Wi-Fi and Bluetooth
result.introduction:
Smart Home

The project aims to develop a system for monitoring electricity consumption by tenants and supervising fire safety.
result.development:
Scope of Responsibilities: 

  • Hardware Integration: Connecting and configuring sensors with the Raspberry Pi Pico microcontroller.
  • Embedded Software Development: Creating software for the Raspberry Pi Pico for data acquisition and processing from sensors.
  • Network Communication: Implementing the Raspberry Pi Pico's connection to a Wi-Fi network for data transmission.
  • Mobile Application Development: Designing and implementing a mobile application for data visualization and system interaction.
